quote: Each of you must decide where you stand. All we ask is that you refuse to kneel. You are the people. You have the power. Open your eyes. Open your minds. Then close the fingers on your hand.
quote_letters: EACH OF YOU MUST DECIDE WHERE YOU STAND ALL WE ASK IS THAT YOU REFUSE TO KNEEL YOU ARE THE PEOPLE YOU HAVE THE POWER OPEN YOUR EYES OPEN YOUR MINDS THEN CLOSE THE FINGERS ON YOUR HAND
